author: rgardler
msg: copy accross all additive stylesheets and ensure they are included in the final widget

author: jasha
msg: RAVE-316 switching to ISO-8859-1 encoding (which is expected by the Servlet spec). Now both the unicode characters from the resource bundle and the search box values are correctly rendered

author: rwesten
msg: The yard configuration now uses FilenameUtils.getName(...) on the SolrServerLocation to ensure that only the relative path to the SolrCore is written as value for the SolrYard.SOLR_SERVER_LOCATION property even if the absolute file to this directory is stored within the SolrYardCondig instance.
